name: Open Recognition
description:
Being an expat, immigrant, student or refugee is quite troublesome, especially when it comes to be recognized in a new place. Getting hired, rent an apartment, find a scholarship, ... Establishing trust without a local network is the most difficult part of settling in somewhere new.

Open Recognition is a **social network** that helps newcomers to get the recognition they need to be part of community. The purpose of the app is helping users to collect trust statements and endorsements from other people.
